TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed DispatcherOperationCallback extends System.MulticastDelegate

Docs.param: An argument passed to the callback.
Docs.summary: Represents a delegate to use for dispatcher operations.
Docs.returns: The object returned by the callback.

remarks.format:
## Remarks It is not necessary to use this delegate for dispatcher operations, but <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperationCallback> and <xref:System.Threading.SendOrPostCallback> use dynamic invoking.
Partial Trust applications do not support dynamic invoking, so you must use either <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperationCallback> or <xref:System.Threading.SendOrPostCallback> if the application is going to be running in Partial Trust.
